original_title: Hold Me Thrill Me Kiss Me
overview: Eli is a burglar who is caught in the act by Twinkle, an heiress who coerces him into a sexual relationship. Their violent break-up makes him a fugitive in search of a new identity. He lands in a trashy trailer park where he touches the lives of several dysfunctional residents.
tagline: A nympho. Her virgin sister. His psycho ex. Hiding from the cops was the easy part!
title: Hold Me Thrill Me Kiss Me
